rComments: I took a seminar with him: Architecture and Urban History. He is very knowledgeable, easy going and open. The seminar was amazing, all we had to do was do the readings and talk about them in the discussion sections, the readings were not always all that relatable but it was fun. There were two small projects and an oral presentation.

Fun teacher, lectures were always interesting & engaging, he's got a goofy sense of humor. He posted "image lists" online before lecture that said what material of that day we would be tested on (lifesaver!). Slides contained little text, so all notes were auditory. Midterm covered 1st half of the quarter, final covering 2nd (not cumulative).
